description: Fixed beginning of solo (changed bends to octave trills according to how kirk plays it live and in the isolated track) and james' part at the end of the solo.
title: King Nothing

description: added slides to bass, i think its more accurate.
title: King Nothing

description: Added some dead notes James plays in the seocnd prechorus and polished the James notes a little more
title: King Nothing

description:
Fixed Kirk parts
Why? Because on the tracks you can hear the pick attacking the string every quarter note, don't change this because he plays it live like that too. We have the stems and it sounds like how I tabbed it.
Also fixed main bridge and added the slide that is both also played live and on the studio recording
Put the Solo in Kirk's track and Moved James' solos from Kirk's track to James track
Fixed bass overfilling measures sometimes
Fixed bridge. Do NOT use grace notes, they don't work with Songsterr.
Fixed verse riff, and now it's how they play it on the Studio and live version (they play the live and the studio regardless, it's just that kirk changes up the solo)
Changed Chorus the correct tabbing, and also how it is played on James guitar
In the studio, there's two James guitars playing the same riff but different ways. The main chorus riff is on James guitar and the other way to play it is on the James Extras track
Fixed the extras outro too, it had grace notes so yea
title: King Nothing

description: fixed an error in the bass.
title: King Nothing

description: fixed the bass, and added an octave to the intro as is heard in the song.
title: King Nothing
